title: 827 45 "A Secret Meeting! Luffy vs. the Fire Tank Pirates!"Transliteration: "Mikkai! Rufi VS Faiatanku Kaizoku-dan" (Japanese:密会！ルフィVSファイアタンク海賊団) Yoshihiro Ueda Kisa Miura March 4, 2018(2018-03-04)
transformers_text: 827 45 A Secret Meeting Luffy vs the Fire Tank Pirates Transliteration Mik kai Ru fi VS Fai a tank u Kai z oku dan Japanese VS Yoshihiro Ueda Kisa Miura March 4 2018 2018 03 04 The Sanji Retrieval Team goes to the Fire Tank Pirates ' hideout to meet Capone Be ge Meanwhile the Sun Pirates tend to an injured Pe kom s and guard him to prevent him from reporting to Big Mom While Nami and Carrot are bathing they have a conversation with Charlotte Chiffon who explains Lola's arranged marriage with Loki the prince of Elba f and how Lola running away from it cost Big Mom an alliance with the giants which resulted in Big Mom abusing Chiffon due do her resemblance to Lola which is why Chiffon feels nothing towards Be ge's plan to assassinate her mother After finishing bathing and changing clothes the Sanji Retrieval Team meets Be ge in person while at the Whole Cake Chateau Big Mom's fourth son Oven arrives
tf_idf_text: secret meeting luffy fire tank pirate transliteration mik kai fai tank kai oku dan japanese yoshihiro ueda kisa miura march sanji retrieval team go fire tank pirate hideout meet capone meanwhile sun pirate tend injured kom guard prevent reporting big mom nami carrot bath conversation charlotte chiffon explain lolas arrange marriage loki prince elba lola run away cost big mom alliance giant result big mom abuse chiffon due resemblance lola chiffon feel nothing towards ges plan assassinate mother finish bath change clothes sanji retrieval team meet person whole cake chateau big mom fourth son oven arrives
